website_summaries.verdict: A very bright, power-saving replacement for older fluorescent lights; users generally found installation easy enough. Watch out for the brittle diffuser cover, however.
pros: Much brighter illumination than similar fluorescent lighting, with little delay in turning on
Users were pleased with the amount of light given off as well as the savings in power
cons: Installation can be a challenge if fitting to an existing electrical box, but includes plenty of mounting holes to work with
Reports of diffuser cover damaged on arrival
A few reports of cover cracking easily when removing

customer_reviews.title: Mucho light!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these things! Getting more lumens of light than I was expecting. Previously had two incandescent fixtures in my garage... each bearing 2x100w. Would occasionally leave (by accident) these 400w on overnight. Unacceptable. These new fixtures burning a measley 80w total were just the ticket. And lightwise these babies are outdoing the old ones! I did one thing: I added as an attachment to each one a toggle bolt at each end for added support. I think in the long run I'll be glad I did. Yeah, I can recommend these fixtures. Only one con I can think of: The plastic canopy (cover) can be a little obstinate to remove. Get the hang of it and you're OK!
customer_reviews.author: G. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Light...and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light. This replaced a 2-tube fluorescent fixture in out laundry room and it puts out a ton of light...and it's stylish as well. I bought another one for my wife's sewing room, and will buy a few more for the garage! As others have noted, this attaches to an existing electrical box (in the ceiling/wall) and, unlike some fluorescent lights, the wiring connections are done in that box...not in the fixture. Luckily, all my ceiling lights have electrical boxes, so I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: We used it to replace the non-functioning fluorescent light in our closet - the tube looked good, as did the ballast, so we were looking at spending more money replacing both than this one cost! It's brighter (1200 lumens is about equivalent to a 75-watt incandescent bulb) than the fluorescent light was, and installation was straightforward. This thing is much lighter in weight than the fluorescent (with ballast) too!
customer_reviews.author: mgoodyear

customer_reviews.title: nice light, could use more wiriing knock outs
customer_reviews.text: Color: 3000k| Bright White used this in my closet to replace the buzzing fluorescent light that was there. this puts out decent light for the closet. it is designed to be mounted to a light fixture box. which i did not have. my old light acted as the junction box. also there was not a large enough hole for the romex to be pulled into the light fixture. so if you do not have a fixture box to mount to be prepared to use a hole saw to modify this to work. like i did. so to summarize. it was more work and time to install. but closet is lit up nice now and wife is happy.
customer_reviews.author: blah blah

customer_reviews.title: You want this light!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just installed this new light fixture, and it's amazing. Easy to install because the housing is nearly empty. Twice the light of the florescent unit it replaced, I'm very satisfied. And $25.00 less than a 24" LED fixture at my local Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Bright, warm, quiet, cheaper to run and no bulbs to deal with.  Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office, so went with the 2700K model. It was a direct replacement for [1] of [2] fluorescent fixtures in the room. The old fixtures were ok, but like all fluoro units, they emit an annoying 60 cycle hum. This unit was easy to install, bright/warm light, VERY quiet. Lower cost to run and never needs bulb replacements. Nice!!! I'm getting another one to do the other half of the room. LEDs are awesome! Recommended buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 4 failed after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought and installed four of these. A couple of weeks of use and one of them stopped working. By then the return window had already passed. These lights are supposed to last a lot longer than two weeks and with a 25 percent failure rate I cant say that I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Boater

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for fancy, this isn't it. I installed it today in my smallish kitchen (about 12x12) and it's much brighter than the two buildings fluorescent fixture that it replaced. It also uses just over half the energy of the old fixture. I fit the wiring onto my junction box in the ceiling. That junction box is about 44 years old, and I didn't have an issue aligning the fixture on my ceiling. I had initially planned to install the two led strip design, but I think that light output would have been overkill.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wood

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the garage(one had a bad ballast)... such a difference!Took about 5 min to install...the other light in the pic is one of the original flourescent fixtures
customer_reviews.author: Colleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install — BRIGHT kitchen light.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a 2-tube 40 w. fluorescent light. It was easy to hook up to the same wiring, the “diffuser” (cover) went on smoothly with 2 of us easing it into the grooves. It is instant on, no flicker or humming, and very bright! Totally satisfied and ready to buy another one for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light is great but it is not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The light is great but it is not easy to install. I have seen this many times. This product is the result of an engineer that had little or no experience installing anything. The LED lights are in the dead center, right where your install bolts should go. If you are replacing another light, be prepared to get upset when you install this. I made it work using old electrical parts saved from a previous demo. This should at least come with a kit so you can install it strait. As I said, I like the light itself. Very bright, no buzz. Poor design lead to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Curran

customer_reviews.title: Provides a good, even light for my workshop and woodworking projects.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my quartz light with this one, and it gives a more even light without the harsh shadows that were a product of the quartz light. A bonus in the summer time is that it produces very little, if any, heat. Of course, that is not so good when the weather turns cold, as the quartz lights provided more heat than you might imagine in my insulated shop. One of the best things is that I don't have to replace the light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: constmgr7

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Outcome (Amazed)
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product has surpassed my expectation. Result: bright and aesthetic (slim and compact) When I received this product I was confused as I don't realize the led lights are a strip of led lights. However, I am amazed with the brightness they shown. Therefore, when compared to my regular ones, it really outshine them. Thinking about replacing the rest with this product. Although I have no way to measure the energy efficiency right now, I would rely on what the review out there regarding led energy efficiency. Installation: can be tricky as to some might require 2 people (for holding purposes). The connection itself was pretty simple. The product is not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: mtaslim

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting, fragile diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Installed this earlier this week. The light has a beautiful warm sunlight color, it's bright, and the product looks great in my kitchen. I would give the product 5* because I love the technology, the look, feel, and performance of the product, but the diffuser is a bit of a pain to install. Mine broke during installation (there's a lip on the backside of the diffuser which separated from the back, and that same corner chipped off). I'm not really sure what to do about the broken diffuser, maybe I'll glue it, but that might look kind of ugly. If anyone has a suggestion, (or a replacement diffuser) I'd love to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and very bright
customer_reviews.text: I’m not at all a very handy guy. I do seem to manage getting minor repairs around the house accomplished. The amount of effort to install was fairly simple and the vast improvement it has made is outstanding. It lights my entire 1 car garage brightly from the far end of the garage. Does a much better job of lighting the garage than the old fluorescent light and apparently costs less to run. I feel that the prices paid is rightly justified and am extremely satisfied with my decision to purchase this light.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan K

customer_reviews.title: Great fixture
customer_reviews.text: Really good and gives much more light than my previous fluorescent fixtures (with 2 tubs each). My garage is now very well lit. One thing that I didn't see in the product description is that this is intended to be installed in a connection box, and I don't have those in my garage. Required a different installation, but worked well anyway.
customer_reviews.author: SCal

customer_reviews.title: It puts out a good amount of light
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a light to put into my garage. It had traditional fixture with 2 bulbs. I never got enough light out of that fixture no matter what bulb was installed. It was pretty easy to install. It will not match up to secure to the power box. I just installed with anchors in the ceiling. The garage on one side, that I installed this light, is brightened up very nicely. I plan on ordering a second on for the other side of the garage soon. Two of these in a 25 X 20 garage will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Deric N

customer_reviews.title: Electronics and illumination quality great, sheetmetal fail unless you're an electrician with a punch set in-hand.
customer_reviews.text: Needs multiple standard electrical knock-outs (1/2" EMT conduit, etc.), a simple sheetmetal stamping process that was completely overlooked. This forces one to either wire the fixture dangling by wires, or get out the Greenlee punch set that the average DIY'er won't have. Ditto mounting holes matching joists. Electrically and ergonomically great, but what a pain to install. So much effort to do the electronics correctly and then blow it entirely on the sheet metal stamping. It isn't like there are no other fixtures on the market to go by as reference.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Lighting cover breaks very easily, hard/expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.text: Diffuser (lighting cover) is incredibly easy to break, busted before we even got it installed. Company says part can only be purchased via Home Depot, costs half the price of the light and I have to pick it up 24 miles away. Can't wait until it breaks again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lahue

customer_reviews.title: Much better than fluorescent tubes
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fixtures to replace fluorescent ones in my laundry room and pantry. The 4000K light temperature and the brightness of these LED fixtures is perfect for those locations. They don't flicker or buzz, and the light is, well, pleasing. Installation was simple.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Light easy to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight easy to mount and connect. Only one mounting option which is top middle. Decent enough construction, it is just one strip of LED’s and a power source. Only just put it up so I cannot speak to the longevity of product. The light is bright without cover but the cover diffuses the light a little to well IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Good lights
customer_reviews.text: Good light fixture for basic shop use. They are also great as they don't have a flourescent "flicker" issue when cold. I have a 4500 Lumen style in my barn and they are bright. For my shop these lower lumen style work better as they aren't too bright but do a great job. They are also very easy to mount and wire in place. Unlike my brighter Lumen lamps which have to be hardwired, this style has a short wiring pigtail. I just mounted a junction box next to each fixture and wired it accordingly. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: M&D

customer_reviews.title: Good fixture after first one arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Puts out lots of good quality light and easy to install. First one arrived damaged but Amazon's great service got me a new one almost immediately. This light is intended to be mounted to a junction box, rather than have romex routed into the box like a typical t8 fixture. It didn't present a big issue in my installation. The cover to the fixture is a little fragile, but there should be no reason to ever remove it. Good fixture for a closet or utility room. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Simon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old 2bulb florescent fixture that went out in my kitchen. Due to the age of this house however the connector box in the ceiling was not the correct pattern to connect it to. Being pressed for time and this was my first time time installing such a fixture I improvised by using the support holes on the ballast. This is not very heavy so using 4screws and anchors I was able to successfully install it. Very happy I can see when I cook now!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany-gq

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE LIGHT OUTPUT! Install is limited.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the halogen spots in my office with these, I'd give them 5*'s but the installation gives you no options for location. The wires and mount are in one place; they have to go over the junction box...the light has to go where it has to go; that off centers in in the room, not real happy about that. As far as function goes, the light output is fantastic, a VERY BRIGHT WHITE! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage and laundry room
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 to replace the horrible florescent figures in my garage and laundry room. We were so tired of the flickering and taking forever to fully light. They look awesome and are very white and brights. There were a couple of reviews complaining that you couldn't replace the LEDs. LEDs will last 20+ years. This is a complete money savor.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Contractor may mean new construction. Had difficulty ...
customer_reviews.text: Warning: Contractor may mean new construction. Had difficulty placing new fixture in old holes. Needed to drill bolt holes under the led strip. This product does not contain bulbs. It contains a long strip of material that has LEDs mounted about every 3 to 2 inches. For flush mount, you are going to have to do some extra work.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: I just installed these lights in our laundry room and they are fantastic. Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why folks seem to have a problem with a "lag" when the light is turned on? Perhaps not wired correctly? I just installed these lights in our laundry room and they are fantastic. Very nice, bright light, easy to install. There is a very small lag when first turned on; maybe 1/2 a second. But that is typical for LEDs. The lag is no where near 2 or 3 seconds. I will be purchasing more for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brushia

customer_reviews.title: Simple but nice LED light
customer_reviews.text: These are Nice LED lights for a garage, office or storage spaces. Very bright and easy to install. Amazing how far technology has come. Come on almost instantaneously. Have not noticed any flicker. These fixtures are very light. As other reviewers have noted the diffuser is kind of flimsy. Be careful when handling It so not to break it. But then once it's up you won't have to replace tube bulbs anymore. Now hoping they will last...
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: like a regular fitting
customer_reviews.text: Main gripe is because its simply a Fluorescent light fitting with LED's screwed to the top,instead of tubes, [2 inches higher than a regular fluorescent tube], the light shines down in a narrow arc. Needs 2 at least to light a 10x10 room. Secondly, minor gripe, no screws for mounting, like a regular fitting.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Botha

customer_reviews.title: Light up with brightness
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace two four tube 10 year old fluorescent fixtures, these were easy to install. And provide a no shadow light in a combo pantry and utility room.
customer_reviews.author: j.j.

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and functional. The lens is a little tricky to remove (you need to 'flex' it to pop out the sides while sliding it to one end. Took off a star for that. You might want to secure the wiring to the side of the fixture or it shows through the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Lamp burned within few hours,  not so bright, hazard to home
customer_reviews.text: After a few hours it started to smell burned. All the lights at home flickered and had to immediately switch off the breaker. I am thankful that I did not have a major electrical failure or worse. I would not trust this brand and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Fenix

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little cooler/yellow than I thought it would be but works ok in a laundry room. Would be pretty dull for a garage. For ideal installation, you need a junction box in the ceiling. We didn't have one so it look longer to install and we had to cut a larger hole in the ceiling to accommodate. No delay in lighting up.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: easy installation, plenty of light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light for a basement office that had no windows and always seemed to be dark no matter the wattage of the bulb that was in the single ceiling receptacle. This unit installed easily and has made the room noticeably brighter. It's bonus that it's more energy efficient and should last a long time. I would buy another if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Damman

customer_reviews.title: Bright quick.
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said it took time to power on/off. Even if it does, it's so minimal. Great fixture & So easy to install by myself with a basic knowledge of wiring. Very happy. The color temperature is perfect for a kitchen. So happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wo

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying this product but the installation was more difficult than it needed to be. The mounts don’t line up with a ceiling mount box.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great garage/workshop light
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted, and I'm very happy with it. It was relatively easy to install, the price is right, and it works very well, both bright and with a cheerful (i.e. not too blue) color temperature. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Larry in Lafayette

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good
customer_reviews.text: This unit looks nice, is very light and went up pretty easily. I had no trouble the the plastic lens, it mounted easily and did not crack. The light output is bright and clean, much better than the old fluorescent tubes it replaced. I'm happy with the purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: texmln

customer_reviews.title: Can't warranty light ??????????
customer_reviews.text: Easy install nice light for garage. But it comes with 5 year warranty which you are to register online. Problem site for warranty is not a good site. sends you to another site! NO where to register product for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Light is great. Easy install. Not the best price at $57.
customer_reviews.text: Light is great. Easy install. Not happy with the $13 price increase after I made the purchase however. I bought the first unit at $44.95. After I bought it, the price suddenly went up to $57 each. Needless to say, I'll be purchasing the other two units I need at Home Depot for less ($44.97). Good product, crappy marketing tactics Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to brighten your Garage
customer_reviews.text: I replaced that single 60W bulb in my garage with two of these units. It took basic wiring and very little to mount them. One of the first units that I received had a broken cover which Amazon quickly replaced without a fuss. They do take a second to kick on when you flip the switch, but provide clean, bright glow.
customer_reviews.author: Diddle Den

customer_reviews.title: Remodel replacement
customer_reviews.text: We were remodeling an area and wanted to add more light to the area over the sink. As we are older LED was a great option since it will last longer. We have already ordered another light for another area. My husband had no trouble installing the light.
customer_reviews.author: profmfc

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good replacement for my fluorescent tube which was over my sink. LED's are better lights. I am replacing a number of old lights with LED where I can. This was a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Jehu

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: This fixture was used over our kitchen sink, nicely tucked behind a piece of fascia board. It worked great for about 6 months, developed a flicker and eventually failed. The ballast has malfunctioned and it no longer works. Now trying to figure out how the heck to submit the warranty on it will likely take more time than I care to muster. Which will likely result in a search for another product to replace this.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: LED's are great but not all fixtures are the same quality.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the quality, the lens seemed fragile and not likely to stay in position for the life of the light. I ordered two and one came with a cracked lens and bent housing.
customer_reviews.author: Circle C

customer_reviews.title: pantry LED light
customer_reviews.text: Very bright... easy for husband to install - but he does have a higher level electrical ability... We installed in a small walk in pantry about 4'x4' and it lights up the enter area nicely. The light is white... not yellow looking. No flickering. Should last for many years. Measurements provided are accurate. I will update my review though, should new info seem useful.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: The king of florescent replacements!
customer_reviews.text: SO tired of the flickering fluorescent fixtures in the closet/laundry/garage I bought 5 and replaced them all and they are brighter, instant on, and much more efficient. I’ll buy more if they go on sale again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my garage, easy install, really bright. You may need an adapter because the holes are not universal, so if you want them a certain direction across ceiling get a universal adapter plate, personally I just hung them as is... I mean it's a garage...
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these to put in my garage to replace a couple of shop lights I had in there when the ballast went out. I have to laugh, when I opened it up I thought, what, the bulbs didn't come with it! The little rectangle dots down the middle are the lights. Great white light. Was 20.00 cheaper at Amazon than in one of the big box stores I looked at first.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not bright at all
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 2400 lumens but I don't see how it could be. I installed this in my garage to replace a single 100W bulb. Not only was the light cut off by the fixture (narrow scope), but it looked like it was half the intensity of the 100W bulb. Why would I pay $50 for a narrow throw and dimmer light? Nope. Going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: love2travel

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement option for fluorescent fixtures.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace fluorescent fixtures in the kitchen in which it seemed that I constantly had to replace the bulbs for. They were pretty easy to install with the existing electrical and do just as well at lighting up the kitchen area as the old fixtures did.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Works so well, we bought 3 more.
customer_reviews.text: We tried-out this unit in our basement, and have been so pleased, that we purchased 3 more for other rooms. LEDs have come a long way, and this one installs in minutes, throws a nice amount of light, and was a whole lot cheaper than local big box retailers. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: red_hemi_rt_2008

customer_reviews.title: Bright clear light and totally overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Was worth it for the $25 I paid for it on amazon but apparently they keep raising the price. The parts are as cheap and flimsy as you will find anywhere. Only thing going for it is that it is bright. But they must be making a whole lot of money off this as it is really overpriced, especially now.
customer_reviews.author: Senor Nahuali

customer_reviews.title: Lots of light, Solid product, but needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Needed to put several in line, but not so easy. wires too short to connect in line, end caps do not have knockouts, and there are no tabs to tie down wires. Need tabs to hold back wires from laying on lens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lights up the stove beautifully. Been using it for about a year now
customer_reviews.text: I put this over my Stove, as we don't have a hood or overhead light. It fit the cabinet bottom perfectly, and with a little extra wiring on my part, lights up the stove beautifully. Been using it for about a year now, and NO complaints. Instant on, and very bright clear light.
customer_reviews.author: Rick R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for the old fluorescents in our carport. One problem was that the original fixtures, and the matching receptacle boxes, had the wire entry hole located in the lateral center of the housing. These, because the LEDs are down the centerline, had those holes offset; that caused some mounting difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: LED Light Fixture
customer_reviews.text: Great price and delivery. The output from this energy efficient LED light is more than adequate. I replaced an old fluorescent tube fixture. Very happy with new LED light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Super D

customer_reviews.title: Great light over washer and dryer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the warm light option and am very pleased with this so far. I’ve only had this for two weeks so can’t comment on how long it will last. I have this in basement laundry area and the light is soft like a lamp light bulb. I hate harsh fluorescent and halogen lighting ! This does the trick ! Glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: frenchtoast

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: The amount of light received compared to how much this costs is the reason for the 4 stars. Installing the unit was not easy due to the screw placements, etc. Overall the light looks nice and it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: John Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, very bright.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good light. I replaced a fluorescent fixture of the same size in my laundry closet. Way brighter, no more flicker and the temperature is much warmer. Looks great. I wouldve gone 5 stars but I feel like the fixture is a little over priced at $50. For what it is, and what it's made from I'd expect it to be in the $25-30 range. If you're like me and you need a bright LED fixture in a warm temp then it's still decent at $50.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: didn't last
customer_reviews.text: A few of the led's started winking in and out after 3 months. Now (9 months later) it is unusable, Entire light blinks on and off continuously. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: not bad but it has leaking light
customer_reviews.text: I installed this one light to replace another brand that is no longer available on Amazon. The light is nice and bright and it turns on faster than my other LED lights but it has light leaking out the sides because of the construction of the fixture. I wish the other light was available.
customer_reviews.author: J. Noll

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Installed in my laundry room, replacing the old fluorescent fixture. The great thing is that there are no bulbs to replace. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Some extra work but  bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice liight, wish it installed like most fluorescent lights, I cut in the junction box to the ceiling not too hard but would be easier install if I was just able to hook up the wires and attach to the ceiling like most 4 foot lights... good amount of light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for. Really cheap. Flickering ...
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. Really cheap. Flickering after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan Valestin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light. Favorably impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light. Favorably impressed. easily installed. It takes about 1/2 second to turn on, and it turn on full brightness. It is at least as bright as 2x40W florescents; color temp is fairly neutral. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Croy

customer_reviews.title: Good fluorescent light replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had fluorescent light in my garage, how to recycle fluorescent light tube became an issue. That was why I consider to buy LED light to replace fluorescent light. This LED light is very easy to install. The 2700K soft white color makes my garage feel warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: fits small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Needed a light to fit in 12inch X 36inch space over kitchen sink and give a lot of light without being obtrusive. Simple installation, perfect size for space, loads of light with no yellow tint.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Ok light but pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly bright but doesn't diffuse out very much. Green wire for ground was very short. Seems like there are better values fixtures out there.
customer_reviews.author: mcard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cover old footprint
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a standard two bulb Flor fixture. A little wider and it would have covered the old standard footprint Instead you get an unsightly Gap to rapair and paint
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light over a kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old dated fluorescent light above my kitchen sink. It’s size is perfect and the light is bright without being glaring. Easy to install too and was half the cost of a similar light from a big box store. I’m very happy with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Super Bright, No Delay
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace a very old fluorescent light bar in my kitchen. It's so much brighter and reliable than that old thing. No delay between flipping the switch and the lights coming on.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light for garage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light for garage, utility room, or workshop. Like all surface mount strip lights, it's not going to win any beauty pageants, but as far as strip lights go, it's quite attractive. Puts out a lot of very nice, even white light, without any hot spots or shadows. LED driver takes a second to power on the LEDs, meaning you have a very brief interval between flipping the switch and getting light. This is really no different than the delay in a fluorescent fixture as the bulbs strike.
customer_reviews.author: WontPontificate

customer_reviews.title: LED light was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Replaced florescent unit which has been failing for some time. Now I wonder why I waited. LED light was easy to install. Provides better lighting. Is "instant" on. AND will last me a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: smart45

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic LED light
customer_reviews.text: The light is fantastic. Price was so reasonable. I highly recommend it. I installed mine in the laundry room. I replaced my old outdated fluorescent one.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: 2700K light is awesome (I never write reviews, but I just love this light)
customer_reviews.text: Buy the warm 2700K light and it's incredible. Bright enough for lighting a work surface, natural light that doesn't bother the eyes, AND NO GLARE. Incredible product I ended up keeping this light after trying like 4 others. Also, I did add some zip ties so I could mount it with hooks. Would have been nice to avoid needing that. But, maybe using hooks is not very common. Something for the company to think about, though I never write reviews, but felt compelled because of how perfect the light it gives off is
customer_reviews.author: Trent M.

customer_reviews.title: Wiring Them
customer_reviews.text: Overall, works well. One problem was shadow caused by wiring crossing light strip, just ran down side and around strip to connect. Very bright & efficient, light and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it in Laundry Room. Perfect Brightness!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old Fluorescent 48in double bulb with this one. Soooooooooo much better. Clean/Neat/Perfect brightness and wife loves it. You will, too!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing upgrade to the garage lighting
customer_reviews.text: This plug and play installation made my garage quite elegant. The light color (4000K) is similar to fluorescent - but without the flicker. Great improvement, with 85% electricity consumption savings. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NOBEL HI-TECH.

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this light to replace an old fluorescent light in our office. This light is super bright and easy to install so we purchased another one and plan on replacing all of our fluorescent lights with this LED as they go out. Caution: these lights are really bright compared to your old fluorescent ones.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: Its a light. It installs easily. It is solid. It puts out good light. The electrician said it was very solid and a good quality. I ordered 12 more. Garage and Truck port...not a car port...we have trucks in the Midwest...are well light with perfect light.
customer_reviews.author: Redoubt Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Light output equal to of better than expected. Fixture well built and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced a 2 tube, 2' fluorescent fixture. Light output is equal to or slightly better than the fixture it replaced. This unit should save on electricity and hopefully, never require maintenance. Fixture is light weight, easy to install and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good looking light for closet etc....
customer_reviews.text: Put one in the same day received. Easy to install. Looks good. Light is really bright. Only issue is a mild humming noise. Never had that in an LCD light.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Claiborne

customer_reviews.title: He said installation was easy.
customer_reviews.text: A huge upgrade from the old fluorescent fixture over our kitchen sink. Lovely light, and the fixture looks very clean and crisp. Our son, who's very mechanically talented, installed it. He said installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dryansky

customer_reviews.title: Way too bright
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, easy to install, and well worth the price. But be aware that this light is WAY too bright. To the point where even with the light diffuser installed, you can hardly look above shoulder height before squinting. We had to put up masking tape to help dilute the light and even that only helped so much.
customer_reviews.author: mister c

customer_reviews.title: Next generation lighting
customer_reviews.text: The LED lights are excellent and need no special skills or equipment to install. They're cool to the touch, and have just the right amount of light. Be sure to pick the right light temperature. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Celso I Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Light was good but the unit looks like it wont hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap plastic ! almost every one was cracked. The plastic covers were all damaged and cracked too. Light was good but the unit looks like it wont hold up for long. They broke. havent even had them on for a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Stefne Shymansky

customer_reviews.title: received less qty than ordered with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 14 and received 13 with one box open and missing parts! With $45/piece, in a hole of $90. Trying to reach Lithonia Lighting but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: This one comes with a ballast unlike the LED wrap ...
customer_reviews.text: This one comes with a ballast unlike the LED wrap light made by Commercial Electric I have in another room. This is not as bright as the one made by another manufacturer. Took longer time for the electrician to install this than the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of crap stay away low price for a cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap stay away low price for a cheaply made product, I have bought this sent it too me damage got another one damage stay away this is a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Chop

customer_reviews.title: So bright, its like a baseball park in my pantry
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old fluorecent fixture with this one and I love it. Easy to install, well made and best of all is that the LED is much brighter than before.
customer_reviews.author: saints4148

customer_reviews.title: Clean, bright light that works well for an 8x11 garage gym
customer_reviews.text: We have this in an 8x11 gym built inside our garage. It's a clean, bright utilitarian light.
customer_reviews.author: G.M.I.

customer_reviews.title: nice price! well made
customer_reviews.text: nice price! well made, easy to install (hardwired to existing junction box) replacement for 2-T5 FL fixture inside recessed soffit light, very bright white 4000k light for bathroom. Installed over a year ago with no problems to date
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and great light for my application. Used as over sink light. Much brighter then the 2' fluorescent light it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a single bulb in a closet and could not be happier. Very light and very bright. Has strip lights instead of bulbs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian 9797

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: Placed this light over my sink in the kitchen. Perfect size and great lighting.
customer_reviews.author: amh

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful light, but be aware it requires two to install. Not an open system, the wires need to be attached before the fixture is attaches so second person needs to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B VanderWal

customer_reviews.title: Bright, low energy light
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace a buzzing, flickering florescent light fixture in a closet. Much brighter and absolutely silent (duh, LEDs). Very easy to install, 10 minutes tops.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy install in place of incandescent fixture.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a cruddy ceiling light in my basement and I got this thing installed in under 15 minutes. Only hard part was getting the plastic cover back in place, but I got it after a minute of two. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: RMB

product_meta.title: Lithonia Lighting FMLWL 48-Inch 840 Contractor Select 4-Foot Flushmount LED Wrap Ceiling Light for Garage| Home| Basement| 2900 Lumens, 120 Volts, 41 Watts, Damp Listed, Bright
product_meta.description:
Size:4-Foot| Color:4000k | Bright WhiteThe Lithonia Lighting 4 Foot LED Wraparound Light provides general lighting and can be mounted to a wall or ceiling. This FMLWL LED linear fixture comes with an impact resistant prismatic acrylic lens and is an ideal replacement for traditional 2-light fluorescent T8 or T12 wraps.
Technical Specifications:

Power: 41W Input Voltage: 120V (Connects directly to power supply via provided UL recognized driver) Luminous Flux: 2900 LM Emitting Color: 4000K (Bright White) Dimmable: NO Light Source: LED CRI: 85 Dimension: 47.4 x 5.5 x 2.6in Light direction: General Average life: 50,000 hours Warranty: 5 years – Limited/ Electrical: Long-life LEDs, coupled with a high-efficiency driver, provide extended service life. Standard input = 20/41 watts (2’/4’), 60 lumens per watt. Fixture operates at 120 volts, 60Hz. Meets Highest Industry Standards: UL certified in the USA and Canada, Energy Star Rated, and Damp Listed More electrical information and complete list of compatible dimmers are located on spec sheet

How many LED lights do I need for the room?
FMLWL 24 840 (2 foot) - 1 unit for a closet measuring less than 4 square feet with an 8-foot ceiling - 2 units for a room measuring between 5 and 8 square feet with an 8-foot ceiling - 3 units for a room measuring between 9 and 10 square feet with an 8-foot ceiling 


FMLWL 48 840 (4 foot) - 1 unit for a room measuring less than 6 square feet with an 8-foot ceiling - 2 units for a room measuring between 7 and 12 square feet with an 8-foot ceiling - 3 units for a room measuring between 13 and 17 square feet with an 8-foot ceiling

Which light colors work for me?
3000K: Used in family homes, hotels, coffee shops and other warm and sweet environments. 4000K: Used in homes with a need of a soft white lighting atmosphere. 5000K: Used in offices, working areas, shopping malls and other commercial areas that needs super bright lighting


Application Areas:
Ideal for new constructions, remodels or retrofit installations. Closets, attics, hallways, bathrooms, kitchens, basements, foyers, bedrooms, offices, utility work areas, garages and other small areas


Installation Guide:
Turn off power at fuse or circuit breaker box! Remove diffuser from housing Remove fixture components Remove knockouts With the power turned off, thread two Screws into junction box Hold the fixture Fixture Housing firmly and connect the green ground wire from the fixture to the bare copper ground wire from the junction box using a Wirenut Use Wirenuts to connect wires Align keyholes on back of Fixture Housing with screws previously installed in junction box and tighten screws to secure fixture Install Diffuser Turn the power on Installation guide for kit included in the package.
feature_bullets: Super Bright Lights - total of 2900 Lumens
Reduces Re-lamp frequence: LEDS maintain 70% of ouput for at least 50,000 hours (17 years with 8 hours/day 365 days/year)
Saves Money - LEDs are Energy Star Rated to save money on electricity bills and possible rebates
Easy Installation makes it perfect for hallways, stairwells, offices, garages and any other locations where ambient light is needed
Meets Safety Standard for UL in USA, Canada and Damp locations and includes 5 year limited warranty

specifications.Special Features: Can be used in damp locations, New Polycarbonate Lens, 4000K - Cool White Light, 50,000 Hours of Life, Hardwired
specifications.Usage: Warehouse, Garage, Shed, Kitchen, Basement, Patio
